citation.title: Solution structures of the SH3 domain of human CRK-like protein.

comment.text: May mediate the transduction of intracellular signals.

Interacts with tyrosine-phosphorylated EPOR and INPP5D/SHIP1 (PubMed:11443118). Interacts with DOCK2 and DOCK5 via its first SH3 domain (PubMed:12393632, PubMed:19004829). Interacts with phosphorylated CBLB and IRS4 (PubMed:10022120, PubMed:9614078).

property.value: Expressed in secondary oocyte and 251 other tissues
P:cellular response to transforming growth factor beta stimulus
P:fibroblast growth factor receptor signaling pathway
P:positive regulation of cell population proliferation
P:positive regulation of ERK1 and ERK2 cascade
P:positive regulation of glial cell migration
P:positive regulation of Ras protein signal transduction
P:positive regulation of substrate adhesion-dependent cell spreading
P:regulation of cell adhesion mediated by integrin
P:regulation of skeletal muscle acetylcholine-gated channel clustering
